text:
The State Duma supported the law on the mandatory pre-installation of Russian software on all smartphones
05 Nov 2019, 17:19 by Artyom Bausov
The State Duma adopted in the first reading a bill on the mandatory pre-installation of Russian software on smartphones, laptops and televisions with the Smart TV function. The exact list of goods will be compiled by the government.
The authors of the document were deputies Sergey Zhigarev, Vladimir Gutenev, Oleg Nikolaev and Alexander Yushchenko. They want to introduce innovation from July 1, 2020.
Violators are offered to fine in the amount of 30 to 200 thousand rubles.
Aleksey Kanaev, a member of the relevant committee on economic policy, argues that the new law is aimed at developing the domestic IT industry and protecting consumer rights. [RIA]
